description:

I should have an apartment coming available in June or July.

If there are things you can't do, then I'll find someone for that/those projects....
No pets or smoking allowed.
Questions? Drop me an email.
I am the landlord.

title: 4BR - 2-Story Beautiful Home in Brewerytown
description:
Lovely 4 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom single family home is ready to impress with stunning, contemporary design and a bright and airy atmosphere in the Brewerytown area. This home has been fully renovated and furnished with all new automation technologies. Complementing this space is an open floor plan of the first floor, beginning with the living room and flowing back through the dining area, into the kitchen. There are windows in front and side of the home, allowing natural light to flow through the entire space. Other features include a half bathroom, in-unit laundry area, wooden ceiling fan, and a chandelier over your dining area. The kitchen is minimalistic and modern, with sleek wooden cabinetry for ample storage, countertops, an island with counter seating, and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, built-in microwave, gas range, and double door refrigerator. Head outside to your private backyard that is perfect for summertime BBQs and entertaining. The second floor has a hallway bathroom with Jacuzzi tub, and three bedrooms that range in size, each with ample closet space and natural light. You will find a small-size room with wood flooring and ceiling fan for a home office or gym. The home has central air conditioning to keep you comfortable all year long. Located within walking distance to great restaurants, bars, and shops on both Girard and Fairmount Ave and is conveniently located to public transportation and I-76.
Tenant pays all utilities: gas, water, and electric. First, last and security to move in!
Email now to book your showing! This beautiful home won’t last!
